name: 甜花
text: お、お待たせ……
trans: Th-Thanks for waiting......

name: 甘奈
text:
あ、甜花ちゃん！
よしっ、これでみんな揃ったね
trans:
There you are, Tenka-chan!
Alright, that's everyone then.

name: 千雪
text: それじゃあ、今日はこの間行けなかったお店に行きましょうか
trans:
Now then, let's head to those stores we couldn't get
to before.

name: 甘奈
text:
うん！
やっぱり服はいろいろ見ないとだもんね
trans:
Yeah!
We've got lots of clothes to check out today.

name: 甜花
text:
う、うん……この前は……全然、わかんなかったから……
今日は……がんばる、ね……！
trans:
Y-Yeah...... Tenka didn't really... get any of it before
so...... she's gonna... work hard today......

name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃん、そんなに急がなくても大丈夫
ゆっくり、探していこう？
trans:
You don't have to push yourself so hard, Tenka-chan.
Let's take our time today, okay?

name: 千雪
text: 今日はかわいいお洋服が見つかるといいですね♪
trans: I hope we can find some nice clothes for you♪

name: 甘奈
text:
よーしっ、じゃあとりあえず、
お店に入ってみよー
trans: Alright, let's head into one of the stores!

name: 甜花
text: お、おー……？

name: 千雪
text: ふふ、おー♪
trans: Fufu, Wooo♪

name: 甜花
text: やっぱり……わかんなかった……
trans: Tenka... still doesn't get it......

name: 甘奈
text:
うーん……これ！　って服は
なかなか見つけられないもんねー
trans:
Hmm... It doesn't seem like you found any clothes
that really jumped out at you.

name: 甘奈
text:
でも、だからこそ見つけたときって嬉しいんだ！
きっと甜花ちゃんも、そんな服を見つけられるよ！
trans:
But that's why it feels so good when we do find it!
I'm sure you'll be able to find them too, Tenka-chan!

name: 甜花
text:
う、うん……
ふぅ……

name: 甘奈
text: あれっ、どうしたの甜花ちゃん？
trans: Hm? What's wrong, Tenka-chan?

name: 甘奈
text:
……あっ、もしかして、甘奈また張り切りすぎちゃった？
疲れさせちゃったかなぁ……？
trans:
...Oh, did I get too ahead of myself again?
Sorry if you're worn out again...

name: 甜花
text:
う、ううん……
そんなことない……けど……
trans: N-No...... that's not it... but......

name: 甘奈
text: けど？
trans: But?

name: 甜花
text:
……あの……ふたりとも……
ぜんぜん決められなくて、ごめんね……？
trans:
......Um... Tenka's sorry for... not being able to decide
on any clothes......

name: 甜花
text:
こないだも、いっぱい服、見てくれたのに……
甜花、ちゃんと選べなくて……
trans:
You even picked out... so much for Tenka to look at......
But... she still couldn't make a decision......

name: 千雪
text:
そんなことないですよ
甜花ちゃんと一緒にお洋服を見られるだけで楽しいですから♪
trans:
Oh, don't worry about it at all.
This is enough fun on it's own, you know♪

name: 甘奈
text: そうだよー！
trans: Yeah, what she said!

name: 甘奈
text:
だって甘奈たちはファンのみんなも見れないような、
いろんな服を着てる甜花ちゃんが見れてるんだよ！？
trans:
I mean, we're getting to see you in all sorts of
outfits that none of our fans even get to witness!

name: 甘奈
text: 甘奈、もうそれだけですっごく幸せだもん！
trans: That makes me happy enough!

name: 千雪
text: 私も、かわいい甜花ちゃんが見られるのはうれしいわ
trans: I'm happy to see you like this too.

name: 甜花
text:
ふたりとも……
にへへ、ありがとう……
trans:
Really......?
Nihehe... thanks......

name: 甜花
text:
でも……ぜんぜんだめで……
やっぱり甜花、おしゃれなんて、むり……
trans:
But...... Tenka can't get it right......
She really can't be... fashionable at all......

name: 甘奈
text: 甜花ちゃん……
trans: Tenka-chan......

name: 甜花
text:
だって……なーちゃんも千雪さんも……
自分の服……すぐに、決められるよね……？
trans:
I mean...... you both find the clothes you like...
super quickly... don't you......?

name: 甘奈
text:
うーん、甘奈は結構決めるの早いかもしれないけど
でも迷うときだってあるから、全然普通だよ！
trans:
Hmm... Well, I do find my clothes quickly, but that
doesn't mean I don't struggle, it's completely normal!

name: 甜花
text: そうなの、かな……？
trans: Are you... sure......?

name: 甜花
text:
普通、とか……
甜花、わかんないから……
trans:
Tenka doesn't... really understand...
what is and isn't "normal"......

name: 千雪
text: ……ねえ、甘奈ちゃん
trans: ...Hey, Amana-chan.

name: 千雪
text:
私たち、
いろいろ言い過ぎちゃったんじゃないかしら……？
trans: Maybe we've been talking a little too much...?

name: 千雪
text:
甜花ちゃん、
何がいいのかわからなくなっちゃうのかも
trans:
Tenka doesn't really understand much of what we've
said, and I think it's confusing her.

name: 甘奈
text: そっか……
trans: I see...

name: 甘奈
text:
ごめんね、甜花ちゃん
甘奈、甜花ちゃんの服を選ぶのがすっごく楽しくて……
trans:
Sorry about that, Tenka-chan. I just love picking out
all of your clothes for you.

name: 甘奈
text: もっと選び方とか話せばよかったのかもしれないね
trans:
Maybe I should have been telling you why I pick what I
pick.

name: 甜花
text: うん……えっと、それも知りたい、けど……
trans: Yeah... Tenka wants... to know that too, but......

name: 甜花
text: で、でも……ふたりが見てくれないと……
trans: B-But...... if you still pick it all out......

name: 甜花
text:
甜花、いい服とか、似合ってるとか、そんなの……
ぜんぜん、わかんないから……
trans:
Tenka doesn't really know... what looks good on her,
what clothes are nice... and stuff......

name: 甜花
text:
いっしょに、服……
見てくれると、うれしいな……
trans: Tenka wants to... look for clothes... together......

name: 甘奈
text:
うんうん、甜花ちゃんのお気に入りが見つかるまで
甘奈は何着でも見るよ！
trans: Sure, I'll look at whatever clothes suit your interests!

name: 甘奈
text: でも、似合う服がわかんないなんてことないよ
trans:
But, you do have a sense of what looks good on you,
you know.

name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃん、大人系コーデでまとめても、
元気系のコーデでまとめてもバッチリだったんだから！
trans:
You were spot on when you pointed out the mature
stuff, or when you looked at the more lively ones too!

name: 千雪
text: ふふ、そうね
trans: Fufu, she's right.

name: 千雪
text:
それに、もしイメージが違ったら
私が仕立て直してあげます♪
trans:
And besides, even if you find something that isn't
good, we'll be there to help out.

name: 千雪
text: だから、甜花ちゃんの好きなお洋服を選んで？
trans: So, you should choose what you want to wear.

name: 甜花
text:
あ……
あ、ありがとう……！
trans:
Oh......
Th-Thank you......!

name: 千雪
text: ふふ、これまでに気になったお洋服とか無かった？
trans: Fufu, has anything caught your eye yet?

name: 甜花
text: え、えっと……えっと……
trans: U-Um... Ummmm......

name: 甜花
text:
……あっ……
あの……じ、実はね……

name: 甜花
text:
さっき見かけたお店で……
気になった服が、あって……
trans:
There was... something in one of the shops... we went
to earlier......

name: 甘奈
text: 本当に！？
trans: REALLY!?

name: 甜花
text:
う、うん……
ちょっと、いいなって……
trans:
Y-Yeah......
Tenka thought... it looked really nice......

name: 千雪
text:
甜花ちゃんが気に入ったお洋服……
ふふ、見てみたいです♪
trans:
You found something you liked...
Fufu, I'd love to see it♪

name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃん！
そのお店、どこか覚えてる？
trans:
Tenka-chan!
Do you remember where that store was?

name: 甜花
text:
えっと……
あっちのほう……
trans:
Umm......
Over in... that direction......

name: 甘奈
text:
じゃあ行ってみよっか！
ね、甜花ちゃん、千雪さん！
trans:
Alright, let's get going!
Come on, Tenka-chan, Chiyuki-san!
